description: oval tin box with scenes of squirrels and chipmunks making deposit with "receiving teller" (an owl); coin slot in back
inscription:
Inscriptions


on front, in black: [SECURITY/ STORAGE AND TRUST/ FOR/ SQUIRRELS + CHIPMUNKS]; [RECEIVING TELLER]
on top, in black above coin slot: [IF YOU GET AND SPEND A PENNY/ THEN OF COURSE YOU HAVEN\'T ANY]
below coin slot: [BE LIKE ME- A HAPPY JACK/ AND PUT IT WHERE YOU\'LL GET IT BACK]
title: "Squirrel Bank" still bank
